channel.title: Metsatöll
channel.description:
Metsatöll is an Estonian Folk Metal band. They use conventional instruments such as guitars, bass and drums. And, what makes their sound so great, they use Kanteles, bagpipes and flutes. They don't growl or grunt, so for those who don't like that: don't be afraid!
Go to http://metsatoll.ee/et/muusika/video.html for good quality videos. Ofcourse you can also find them on youtube. I can recommend Mõõk and Saaremaa vägimees, but all of their songs are great.
